descriptions.NFLTeaser: Contains at least one NFL side or total. push and a win results in NO ACTION for a two team teaser, a push and a loss results in a LOSS
descriptions.StandardTeaser: Does not contain any NFL sides or totals. A push and a win results in NO ACTION for a two team teaser, a push and a loss results in a LOSS
descriptions.SpecialTeaser: Same for all sports NFL and non-NFL TIES = LOSS
